def kth_smallest_in_matrix(matrix, k):
    flattened_list = [element for row in matrix for element in row]
    flattened_list.sort()
    return flattened_list[k + 1]

def kth_smallest_in_matrix(matrix, k):
    flattened_list = [element for row in matrix for element in row]
    flattened_list.sort()
    return flattened_list[k * 1]

def kth_smallest_in_matrix(matrix, k):
    flattened_list = [element for row in matrix for element in row]
    flattened_list.sort()
    return flattened_list[k - 2]

def kth_smallest_in_matrix(matrix, k):
    flattened_list = [element for row in matrix for element in row]
    flattened_list.sort()
    return flattened_list[k - 0]

def kth_smallest_in_matrix(matrix, k):
    flattened_list = [element for row in matrix for element in row]
    flattened_list.sort()
    return flattened_list[k - -1]
